data.title: William Butler Yeats, an Irish poet that was awarded the Nobel Prize in Literature in 1923. Yeats was critical of the traditional...
data.meta_description:
4 likes, 0 comments - cch_inc on April 26, 2024: "William Butler Yeats, an Irish poet that was awarded the Nobel Prize in Literature in 1923.
Yeats was critical of the traditional educational system, feeling that it stifled creativity and individuality. He believed that education should encourage imagination and artistic expression rather than focusing on memorization and conformity.
Our goal as educators is to foster a love for learning. We want the children to leave our center wanting and needing to know more about the world around them. #cch #earlychildhood #ece #childcare #daycare #education #preschool #toddler #infant #childdevelopment #playbasedlearning #earlylearning #hamptons #hamptonslife #teacher #teaching #childcarecenterofthehamptons".
